issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Correct convert_replace function for invalid chars on string beginning
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13217](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13217). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The CONVERT_REPLACE Gandiva function is not working properly for invalid chars on the beginning of the string (e.g. "\xa0\xa1-valid" should be  "-valid" considering an empty replacement char. But it is not replacing correctly).
